subject: Re: SetUp for entire suite in Junit 4?
msgSnippet: To answer my own question, it turns out that if you use @RunWith(Suite.class) on a class and add @BeforeClass and @AfterClass to that class, then they will run

To answer my own question, it turns out that if you use
@RunWith(Suite.cla=
ss) on a class and add @BeforeClass and @AfterClass
to that class, then the=
y will run before and after the whole suite.

nice.
